en.page-title: State 214: A Story of Growth and Unity
en.introduction: State 214 was officially launched in April 2023, entering the world of Whiteout Survival amidst fierce competition and dynamic leadership. Despite early challengesâ€”internal power struggles, shifting alliances, and growing painsâ€”the state quickly found its footing through collaboration, diplomacy, and a shared commitment to the community over individual control.
en.growth: Through countless battles, strategic decisions, and community efforts, State 214 has become one of the most successful and respected states in the game. Its strength lies in the cohesion and teamwork fostered among its players, allowing for consistent growth and achievement.
en.losses-text: From January to March 2024, State 214 experienced significant losses. We saw the dissolution of several key alliances, including AXE (formerly TEX), BLK, and part of USA, as they began to disband and leave the state. This period was a challenging time, as our best alliances and dear friends, such as TDS/TLS, also followed suit, leaving a void.
en.new-alliances: Challenges with New Alliances: September - December 2024
en.new-alliances-text: In September 2024, we welcomed a new alliance that initially joined State 214 with good intentions. However, after a short period, some members of this alliance showed a lack of interest in collaboration and instead spread chaos and discord. As a unified state, we faced this challenge together, particularly with the support of ODA. In December 2024, the entire state took a stand against the disruptive players. By January 2025, after much unrest, the remaining members of this alliance were forced to consider and eventually execute a transfer, thus restoring order and unity within State 214.
en.key-milestones-text: In April 2024, State 214 welcomed ODA from State 245, marking a pivotal moment in its development. Their leadership and participation played a crucial role in reorganizing the state, alongside DOA, to improve coordination and reinforce the alliances that would define the stateâ€™s success.
en.fusion: The great state fusion in winter 2025 was another significant turning point. State 214 absorbed skilled players from State 196, further boosting its power, diversity, and ambition. The merger was more than just an increase in numbers; it strengthened the community and injected new passion and drive into the state.
en.recent-story-1: October 2025: With regret, BKK transferred out of State 214. We sincerely thank them for the time and effort they invested here, and we wish them all the best on their new path.
en.recent-story-2: November 2025: State 214 was strengthened by an alliance arriving from State 153. Together, they established LOU in 214 and immediately became a valuable part of our community. We look forward to strong, respectful cooperation.
en.recent-story-3: December 2025: ODA also left State 214. We are grateful for the shared journey and wish them continued success and good luck ahead.
en.recent-story-4: January 2026: During the State Transfer, PBT departed State 214. We appreciate the time we shared together and wish them all the best on their journey ahead.
en.looking-ahead-text: The future of State 214 is focused on a common goal: the Frostdragon Tyrant. The ambition now is to unite three elite alliances in this high-stakes event and, ultimately, to bring the Tyrant itself under State 214â€™s banner. This vision drives our community to keep pushing the limits of what we can achieve together.
en.footer-text: Â© 2026 State 214 Community â€“ Built by players, for players Â· All Stars United

id.introduction: State 214 resmi diluncurkan pada April 2023, memasuki dunia Whiteout Survival di tengah persaingan sengit dan kepemimpinan dinamis. Meski menghadapi tantangan awalâ€”perebutan kekuasaan internal, perubahan aliansi, dan masa pertumbuhanâ€”state ini cepat menemukan pijakan melalui kolaborasi, diplomasi, dan komitmen bersama pada komunitas di atas kontrol individu.
id.growth: Melalui banyak pertempuran, keputusan strategis, dan upaya komunitas, State 214 telah menjadi salah satu state paling sukses dan dihormati dalam game. Kekuatannya ada pada kekompakan dan kerja sama tim, yang memungkinkan pertumbuhan dan pencapaian yang konsisten.
id.losses-text: Dari Januari hingga Maret 2024, State 214 mengalami kerugian signifikan. Beberapa aliansi kunci bubar atau meninggalkan state, termasuk AXE (sebelumnya TEX), BLK, dan sebagian USA. Ini adalah periode yang sulit, karena aliansi terbaik dan teman dekat kami seperti TDS/TLS juga ikut pergi, meninggalkan kekosongan.
id.new-alliances: Tantangan dengan Aliansi Baru: September - Desember 2024
id.new-alliances-text: Pada September 2024, kami menyambut aliansi baru yang awalnya bergabung dengan niat baik. Namun, setelah beberapa waktu, sebagian anggota kurang berminat bekerja sama dan justru menyebarkan kekacauan. Sebagai state yang bersatu, kami menghadapi ini bersamaâ€”terutama dengan dukungan ODA. Pada Desember 2024, seluruh state berdiri melawan pemain yang mengganggu. Menjelang Januari 2025, setelah banyak ketegangan, anggota yang tersisa terpaksa mempertimbangkan dan menjalankan transfer, sehingga ketertiban dan persatuan pulih kembali.
id.key-milestones-text: Pada April 2024, State 214 menyambut ODA dari State 245â€”sebuah momen penting dalam perkembangan. Kepemimpinan dan partisipasi mereka, bersama DOA, berperan besar dalam reorganisasi, meningkatkan koordinasi, dan memperkuat aliansi yang menentukan kesuksesan State 214.
id.fusion: Fusi besar state pada musim dingin 2025 adalah titik balik penting lainnya. State 214 menyerap pemain berbakat dari State 196, meningkatkan kekuatan, keberagaman, dan ambisi. Fusi ini bukan hanya soal jumlahâ€”ia memperkuat komunitas dan membawa energi baru.
id.recent-story-1: Oktober 2025: Dengan penyesalan, BKK melakukan transfer keluar dari State 214. Kami berterima kasih atas kebersamaan dan mendoakan yang terbaik untuk perjalanan baru mereka.
id.recent-story-2: November 2025: State 214 diperkuat oleh aliansi yang datang dari State 153. Bersama-sama mereka mendirikan LOU di 214 dan langsung menjadi bagian berharga dari komunitas kami. Kami menantikan kerja sama yang kuat dan saling menghormati.
id.recent-story-3: Desember 2025: ODA juga meninggalkan State 214. Kami bersyukur atas perjalanan bersama dan mendoakan kesuksesan serta keberuntungan ke depannya.
id.recent-story-4: Januari 2026: Saat State Transfer, PBT meninggalkan State 214. Kami menghargai waktu kebersamaan dan mendoakan yang terbaik untuk perjalanan mereka selanjutnya.
id.looking-ahead-text: Masa depan State 214 berfokus pada tujuan bersama: Frostdragon Tyrant. Ambisinya adalah menyatukan tiga aliansi elite dalam event berisiko tinggi ini dan pada akhirnya membawa Tyrant di bawah panji State 214. Visi ini mendorong komunitas kami untuk terus melampaui batas kemampuan bersama.
